name: SexyHub ❤️
detailed_description:
One of the first adult games, released in 1982 is now REBORN, in sexy 3D!

You play as a sexy thirsty female that is very hungry for love juice, taking it as far as collecting some random buff sexy dude's juice.
Collect all the white stuff that's comming from the guy's genitals to SURVIVE in 20 INTENSE waves, avalible in 2 difficulties.
Fully Uncensored sexy 3D artwork and animations. MORE CUMMING IN THE NEXT UPDATE

FEATURES
-Play as a Sexy brunette
-Nice sexy chiptune music
-Sexy voice actress ;)
-2 difficulties
-20 intense waves
-Sexy 3D Artwork
-Sexy 3D Animations

MORE GAME MODES CUMMING IN THE NEXT UPDATE
Achievaments comming later

short_description: The infamous 1982 classic called "Beat em and Eat Em" is reborn. The objective is simple - collect all the "white stuff". Survite 20 intense waves, with each wave the difficulty rapidly increases. Get rewarded with sexy and erotic artwork.
